name: Format\Map
description: The component for adding a map.

properties.name: latitude
properties.description:
The latitude of the map’s center. Provide both a latitude and longitude, or an array of items.
If no center latitude/longitude has been provided, but one or more map items have been provided, the map automatically determines the center location of the map from the map items.

properties.name: longitude
properties.description:
The longitude of the map’s center. Provide both a latitude and longitude, or an array of items.
If no center latitude/longitude has been provided, but one or more map items have been provided, the map automatically determines the center location of the map from the map items.

properties.name: accessibilityCaption
properties.description: The caption that describes what is visible on the map. The text is used for VoiceOver. For more information about VoiceOver, see the  page in Accessibility.  If accessibilityCaption is not provided, the caption value is used for VoiceOver for iOS, VoiceOver for iPadOS, and VoiceOver for macOS.

properties.name: anchor
properties.description: An object that defines vertical alignment with another component.

properties.name: animation
properties.description:
An object that defines an animation to be applied to the component.
The none value is used for conditional design elements. Adding it here has no effect.

properties.name: behavior
properties.description:
An object that defines behavior for a component, like  or .
The none value is used for conditional design elements. Adding it here has no effect.

properties.name: caption
properties.description: A string that describes what is displayed on the map. The caption is displayed in the full screen version of the map. This text is used by VoiceOver if accessibilityCaption is not provided. For more information about VoiceOver, see the  page in Accessibility.

properties.name: conditional
properties.description: An instance or array of component properties that can be applied conditionally, and the conditions that cause them to be applied.

properties.name: hidden
properties.description: A Boolean value that determines whether the component is hidden.

properties.name: identifier
properties.description: An optional unique identifier for this component. If used, this identifier must be unique across the entire document. You will need an identifier for your component if you want to anchor other components to it.

properties.name: items
properties.description: An array of MapItems. If latitude and longitude are not set, at least one item containing latitude and longitude should be added to the items array.

properties.name: layout
properties.description:
An inline ComponentLayout object that contains layout information, or a string reference to a ComponentLayout object that is defined at the top level of the document. 
If layout is not defined, size and position will be based on various factors, such as the device type, the length of the content, and the role of this component.

properties.name: mapType
properties.description:
A string that defines the type of map to display by default. 
Valid values:

properties.name: span
properties.description: An object for defining the visible area of a map, relative to its center. A span is defined in deltas for latitude and longitude.

properties.name: style
properties.description:
An inline ComponentStyle object that defines the appearance of this component, or a string reference to a ComponentStyle object that is defined at the top level of the document.
The none value is used for conditional design elements. Adding it here has no effect.
